Halfling Features

Lucky: When you roll a 1 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Lightfoot Halfling Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Lightfood Halfling race used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Charisma. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ?? ??
